actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,400 the amount of outside earnings which (subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $3,4000 the amount of outside earnings which is permitted each year without any deductions from benefits under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance).

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,400 the amount of outside earnings which (subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted each year without any deductions from benefits thereunder.
